Basic:
import { Switch } from '@ark-ui/react'

export const Basic = () => (
  <Switch.Root>
    <Switch.Control>
      <Switch.Thumb />
    </Switch.Control>
    <Switch.Label>Label</Switch.Label>
  </Switch.Root>
)
InitialValue:
import { Switch } from '@ark-ui/react'

export const InitialValue = () => (
  <Switch.Root defaultChecked>
    <Switch.Control>
      <Switch.Thumb />
    </Switch.Control>
    <Switch.Label>Label</Switch.Label>
  </Switch.Root>
)
